mapper.select: SELECT d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt, count(t.product_code) as deliveryQy FROM delivery d join DELIVERY_DETAILS t on d.delivery_code = t.delivery_code group by t.product_code, d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt

SELECT p.product_code, p.product_name, sum(d.delivery_qy) as productQy FROM delivery_details d join product_info p on d.product_code = p.product_code WHERE product_se = 'PT02' and delivery_code = #{deliveryCode} group by p.product_code, p.product_name
SELECT get_comm(product_size) as product_size_info FROM product_option WHERE product_code = #{productCode} GROUP BY product_size ORDER BY product_size
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory(lot, product_code, store_qy, inventory_qy, product_color, product_size, store_charger, storage_location, store_date, product_se) VALUES(concat(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd'),LPAD(inventory_lot_seq.nextval, 4,'0')), #{productCode}, #{sizeS}, #{sizeS}, #{productColor}, #{sizeCode}, #{name}, 'test', sysdate, 'PT02')
